{% extends "layout.html" %} {% block title %} Sports memorabilia {% endblock %} {% block content %} {% filter markdown %} ## Your new hobby is: # Sports memorabilia Sports memorabilia refers to collectables associated with sports. Types include equipment, trophies, sports cards, autographs, photographs, etc. A multi-billion-dollar industry has grown up around the trading of sports memorabilia. Individual items can be valued in the millions of dollars. For example, a T206 Honus Wagner baseball card was sold for $2.8 million in 2007. As a result, fakes have become a serious problem. Find out more on [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sports memorabilia)! {% endfilter %} {% endblock %}
